The day I broke up with him I put on a crop top, ate a burrito and cussed up an oblivion. My next seriously boyfriend from 21-25 wanted me to do aaaalll kinds of things I was never comfortable with. Wanted me to be a dessert chick with long hair. Never wear floral print because “that’s what fat chicks wear” oh and don’t ever wear a maxi dress around him. He called those “hippy mumus”. My poor husband, once I started dating him I said “I will do whatever the fuck I want with my hair. I’m never going to surf even if you want me to and I will fluctuate my weight like you won’t believe. Deal with it” and man has he loved me for every size and shape and hair color. Took me till my late 20s to finally realize I should be loved for ME. Not a version of me that they liked
